definitions.definition: A small town and civil parish with a town council in Shropshire , England ( OS grid ref SO2980 ) . The council has the curious title of "Clun Town Council with Chapel Lawn" .
A river in Shropshire and Herefordshire , England , which joins the River Teme .
A river , the Afon Clun in Rhondda Cynon Taf borough county borough, Wales , which joins the Ely River.
